Key.English: ALiVE Multispawn enables some handy Respawn functionalities! Please see our WiKi for more information!

Markers: Insertion: ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_INSERTION_%SIDE% / ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_DESTINATION_%SIDE%! Faction based: ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_RESPAWN_%FACTION%! Spawn in vehicle: ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_RESPAWNVEHICLE_%FACTION%
SoS: BF style respawn! Ins.: Simulates constant Air insertion! Fac.based: based on factions not sides! Click Show Info!
Only one multispawn module can be used
Allowed to spawn on squadmates even if enemies are near!
